name: Apple Cider Bliss
description: With golden hues and a refreshing finish, it's like sipping the soul of an autumn orchard—bright, bold, and deeply satisfying.

name: Velvet Vine Reserve
description: Aged to perfection, this reserve blend offers deep flavours of blackcurrant and plum, wrapped in subtle oak and spice.

name: Citrus Ember Brew
description: Bursting with the brightness of orange, lime, and tangerine, this brew finishes with a subtle ember-like spice that lingers on the palate.

name: Golden Bloom Elixir
description: With hints of chamomile, elderflower, and a touch of honeyed apricot, it blooms on the palate like sunlight through wildflowers.

name: Blackcurrant Bliss
description: Dark and decadent, this rich blueberry wine evokes the serenity of a moonlit orchard. Naturally sweet with a velvety texture.

name: Peach Perfection
description: Light and luscious, this wine captures the juiciness of perfectly ripened peaches with a clean, sweet finish.

name: Amber Bliss
description: Juicy and exotic, this tropical treasure brims with the sweet, tangy allure of ripe pineapples. A holiday in a bottle.

name: Nature's Whisper
description: With notes of rosemary, sage, and a whisper of mint, this herbal blend offers a clean, revitalising flavour with a naturally bittersweet edge.

name: Lemon Lush
description: A smooth, citrus-forward wine with vibrant lime notes and a whisper of sweetness—an energising tropical treat.

name: Citrus Glow
description: A radiant blend of citrus fruits delivering a burst of zesty sunshine in every sip. Light-bodied and energising.

name: Berry Royale
description: A tart and tangy delight that dances on the palate with bright cranberry tones and a refreshing, lip-smacking finish.

name: Plum Royale
description: Deep and elegant, this regal wine balances the boldness of ripe plums with a touch of spice and a velvet finish.

name: Verdana Crush
description: A lush, tropical fusion of juicy orange, ripe guava, and zesty lime.

name: Jade Grove
description: A verdant blend of garden-fresh guava, sun-drenched oranges, and tart lime, steeped in a wave of green vitality.

name: Mango Basil Breeze
description: Ripe mango and sweet basil swirl together in this golden, slightly herbal blend that’s equal parts lush and light.

name: Emerald Zest
description: A punchy, vibrant splash of sun-ripened kiwi with a twist of citrus and a hint of cool mint.

name: Twilight Berry Bloom
description: A rich, velvety swirl of ripe blueberries with subtle hints of blackcurrant and a whisper of lavender.

name: Solar Squeeze
description: Bursting with the pure essence of sun-ripened oranges, Solar Squeeze is a golden pour of citrus sunshine.

name: Crimson Ember
description: A bold fusion of pomegranate, sun-dried dates, and black plums, Crimson Ember Elixir glows with warmth and depth.

name: Sunburst Orange
description: A radiant rush of sun-ripened oranges with a twist of lemon and a subtle fizz—bright, juicy, and brimming with citrusy sparkle.

name: Blueberry Sage
description: A moody, antioxidant-rich mix of wild blueberries, subtle garden and a touch of orange.

name: Peach Petal Glow
description: A dreamy fusion of sun-ripened peach, a touch of strawberry, and creamy coconut milk—Peach Petal Glow is the essence of soft elegance

name: Golden Grain Smoothie
description: Banana, pear, soaked oats, and a splash of coconut milk — smooth, mellow, and comforting with that clean, warm wheat tone.

name: Verdant Vibe
description: A lush green fusion of ripe kiwi, crisp green apple, cool cucumber, and zesty lime.

name: Whisperleaf
description: Delicately steeped herbs like lemongrass, mint, and holy basil mingle with cucumber essence and a hint of green grape.

name: Clementine Rush
description: A juicy burst of sweet tangerines with a splash of citrus zest.

name: Apple Cup
description: Sun-kissed apples, handpicked at peak ripeness, are cold-pressed to perfection in this crisp and refreshing golden blend.

name: Orange Can
description: Freshly squeezed from the juiciest oranges, ripened under golden skies. It is smooth, tangy, and naturally sweet.

name: Apple Jug
description: Sun-kissed apples, handpicked at peak ripeness, are cold-pressed to perfection in this crisp and refreshing golden blend.

name: Apple Bucket
description: Sun-kissed apples, handpicked at peak ripeness, are cold-pressed to perfection in this crisp and refreshing golden blend.

name: Orange Box
description: Freshly squeezed from the juiciest oranges, ripened under golden skies. It is smooth, tangy, and naturally sweet.

name: Just Juice
description: The perfect blend of strawberries and kiwis with an appple base.

name: Pear Punch
description: A beautiful blend of sun-pecked pears perfectly concocted for a blissful taste.

name: Apple Tumbler
description: Sun-kissed apples, handpicked at peak ripeness, are cold-pressed to perfection in this crisp and refreshing golden blend.

name: Strawberry Yoghurt
description: A creamy, tangy strawberry yoghurt that combines the smooth richness of dairy with the natural sweetness and refreshing taste of ripe strawberries.

name: Rotokas
description: Made from freshly squeezed limes, it offers a perfect balance of tartness and sweetness, providing a revitalizing experience on hot days or whenever you need a pick-me-up.

name: Tangy Mango
description: Made with pure mango puree and a hint of natural sweetness, it offers a smooth, refreshing flavor that transports you to a sunny paradise.

name: Twin Tropicals
description: Bursting with natural sweetness and a hint of tropical zest, this beverage offers a smooth and invigorating experience.

name: Orange Bucket
description: Freshly squeezed from the juiciest oranges, ripened under golden skies. It is smooth, tangy, and naturally sweet.

name: Berry Smoothie
description: A deliciously creamy berry smoothie packed with the vibrant flavors of fresh strawberries, blueberries, raspberries, and blackberries.

name: Crimson Chill
description: A bold, frozen fusion of tart cherries and lush raspberries, whipped into a velvety smoothie that hits with tang and finishes with deep berry sweetness.

name: Pineapple Radiance
description: Smooth, sweet, and zesty with a bright tang, it's the perfect island escape—no passport needed.

name: Brown Sugar Bliss
description: A creamy indulgence cascading with molten brown sugar syrup and packed with chewy black pearls and golden popping boba.

name: Blushberry Fizz
description: A sparkling blend of strawberries, raspberries, and a twist of lime—light, bubbly, and flirty with a sweet citrus edge.

name: Zest Mirage
description: Lemon, tangerine, and grapefruit swirl with sparkling soda and a hint of rosemary—bright, clean, and dreamlike.

name: Avococo Chill
description: A tropical fusion of avocado, coconut milk, and vanilla ice

name: Green Velvet Latte
description: Avocado, matcha, and almond milk swirled into a smooth iced latte.

name: Sunset Tide
description: A vibrant mix of pineapple, mango, and coconut water with a splash of grenadine—like sipping the last rays of a tropical sun.

name: Avocado Dream Whirl
description: A silky-smooth blend of ripe avocado, sweet cream, and a hint of honey.

name: Tropical Matcha
description: A vibrant, layered fusion of creamy avocado, ripe mango, and earthy matcha. Perfect for hot days, post-yoga glow, or your next aesthetic IG post.

name: Tropicado mix
description: A bold mix of avocado, mango and a splash of lime juice.

name: Lime Leaf Velvet
description: A botanical twist on the classic green smoothie, this one’s bright, mellow, and seriously calming.
